dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Intruder, why have you ventured into the domain of the mighty Moltenrage? Speak your purpose.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to negotiate a truce.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A truce with the Fire Giant? Your audacity is matched only by your foolishness. What do you offer?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Untouched lands in exchange for peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Untouched lands? Ha! The Fire Giant cares not for such trivial offerings. Depart now or face the flames.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: An alliance to conquer common foes.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An alliance, you say? Moltenrage could use a pawn. Swear your allegiance, and you may survive.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking knowledge about the Fire Giants.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge? Mortals dare to seek understanding of the eternal flames? Speak quickly before I lose interest.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I wish to learn about your history and culture.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Curiosity may spare you, for now. Listen closely then, and I shall grant you a glimpse of our fiery legacy.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek your weaknesses to exploit.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Exploit, you say? Moltenrage sees through your deceit. Begone before you face the true wrath of the flames.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you to a duel of strength and wit.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A challenge? Bold words from a fragile being. Prepare to face the searing fury of Moltenrage.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I accept your challenge with honor.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Honor? Moltenrage cares not for such concepts. The flames will judge your worth.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I retract my challenge. Let us avoid needless conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Retract? Weakness is your true nature. Moltenrage shall relish in your suffering.
